i1.name: Mark_of_the_Kindred
description:
{{sbc|Innate:}} Both '''Lamb''' and '''Wolf''' mark targets to ''hunt'', scoring a {{tip|takedown}} against a ''hunted'' target collects a stack of ''Mark of the Kindred''.

{{sbc|Mark of the Kindred:}} '''Lamb''' gains {{pp|type=Marks|75;100;125;150;175;200;225;250|4;7;10;13;16;19;22;25|formula=+75 at 4 stacks, and +25 every 3 stacks thereafter, up to 250 bonus range at 25 stacks.}} {{sti|range|'''bonus''' range}} on her basic attacks and ''{{ai|Mounting Dread|Kindred}}''.

{{sbc|Innate - Lamb:}} '''Lamb''' is offered a selection of enemy {{tip|champions}} to ''hunt'' if she hasn't been [[combat status|in combat]] with them in the last 6 seconds. Once selected, the mark is applied after an 8-second delay and thereafter it can be collected by '''Kindred'''. '''Lamb''' gains the ability to select a new target every 75 seconds. ''Targets successfully hunted cannot be marked again for 4 minutes.''
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Both Lamb and Wolf mark targets to hunt, scoring a takedown against a hunted target collects a stack of Mark of the Kindred.

Mark of the Kindred: Lamb gains 4;7;10;13;16;19;22;25 ‒ undefined bonus range on her basic attacks and Kindred's Mounting Dread.
Innate - Lamb: Lamb is offered a selection of enemy champions to hunt if she hasn't been combat status with them in the last 6 seconds. Once selected, the mark is applied after an 8-second delay and thereafter it can be collected by Kindred. Lamb gains the ability to select a new target every 75 seconds. Targets successfully hunted cannot be marked again for 4 minutes.
Innate - Wolf: Starting at 3:15, Wolf periodically marks a random large monster within the enemy team's jungle for 180 seconds. The hunted camp is highlighted on the Map (League of Legends) to both teams. Once the hunted target is slain, Wolf will wait 45 seconds before selecting a new target.
The type of monster that Wolf can mark changes based on Kindred's current stacks: * 0 : Rift Scuttler * 1 – 3: Rift Scuttler, Crimson Raptor, Gromp * 4 – 7: Ancient Krug, Blue Sentinel, Greater Murk Wolf, or Red Brambleback * 8 + : Rift Herald or Baron Nashor, Dragon or Elder Dragon
i1.notes:
* {{tip|Takedown|Takedowns}} on {{tip|monsters}} occur if '''Kindred''' had damaged them within the last 6 seconds.
** This only includes if the monster was slain by '''Kindred''' or an ally.
* Only killing the large monster is required to claim '''Wolf's''' mark.
* Gaining stacks from champions that would change what constitutes as a valid target for '''Wolf''' will not affect '''Kindred's''' ability to claim '''Wolf's''' current target.
* '''Wolf''' cannot mark monsters that have been slain, even if '''Kindred's''' team doesn't know that the camp has been slain. 
* '''Wolf's''' cooldown is not displayed in-game. Combined with the above point and the target restrictions, '''Wolf''' may go extended periods of time without seeming to do anything. 
* '''Wolf's''' marked target will always have its mark removed from the map 15 seconds after dying for both teams, regardless of whether they have vision of it or not.

q1.name: Dance_of_Arrows
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lamb''' {{tip|dashes}} toward the target location, gaining {{sti|attack speed|{{as|25%|attack speed}}}} {{as|(+ 5% per {{ai|Mark of the Kindred|Kindred|Stacks}})|buzzword}} {{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}} for 4 seconds.

After dashing, '''Lamb''' fires an arrow at up to 3 nearby {{tip|sight|visible}} enemies, dealing {{as|physical damage}}. '''Lamb's''' current attack target at any proximity will be prioritized by one of the arrows.
Casting ''{{ai|Wolf's Frenzy|Kindred}}'' or using ''Dance of Arrows'' while inside its area will {{sti|cdr|reduce}} the cooldown to an amount.
'''Lamb''' can cast any of her [[champion ability|abilities]] during ''Dance of Arrows' '' dash.
''Dance of Arrows'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Lamb's''' basic attack timer.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Lamb dashes toward the target location, gaining 25% (+ 5% per Kindred's Stacks) bonus attack speed for 4 seconds.
After dashing, Lamb fires an arrow at up to 3 nearby visible enemies, dealing physical damage. Lamb's current attack target at any proximity will be prioritized by one of the arrows.
Casting Kindred's Wolf's Frenzy or using Dance of Arrows while inside its area will reduce the cooldown to an amount.
Lamb can cast any of her champion ability during Dance of Arrows' dash.
Dance of Arrows resets Lamb's basic attack timer.
q1.notes:
* The dash does not have a fixed range, it can be directed by up to 340 units.
* The dash distance can be extended to up to 400 units when dashing across terrain.
* The cooldown will not be modified if it cannot be reduced (the current cooldown would have to be less than the reduction amount in this case).

w1.name: Wolf's_Frenzy
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} As '''Kindred''' move and attack, they build up to 100 stacks of ''Hunter's Vigor''. At full stacks, '''Lamb's''' next basic attack {{tip|heals}} her for {{as|{{pp|0 to 100 by 25|0 to 80|formula= 1.25% per 1% of '''Kindred's missing''' health. ''This is capped at 80% '''missing''' health.''|label1='''Missing''' health|type='''Kindred's''' '''missing''' health|label=Percent of level-scaling value|key=%|key1=%|changedisplay = true}}}} of {{pp|49 to 100}} health.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Wolf''' {{tip|dashes}} to the target location and occupies the area for the next {{fd|8.5}} seconds, separating from '''Lamb'''. '''Wolf''' [[Champion summoned units|autonomously]] attacks enemies within the area, prioritizing '''Lamb's''' attack target.

'''Wolf's''' basic attacks deal {{as|magic damage}} and scale with {{as|25% of '''Kindred's bonus''' attack speed}}. Against [[monster]]s, '''Wolf''' deals 50% increased damage and his attacks {{tip|slow}} the target by 50% for 2 seconds.
''Wolf's Frenzy'' ends immediately if '''Lamb''' leaves the area or dies.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: As Kindred move and attack, they build up to 100 stacks of Hunter's Vigor. At full stacks, Lamb's next basic attack heals her for 0 to 80 ‒ undefined of 49 − 100 (based on level) health.
Active: Wolf dashes to the target location and occupies the area for the next 8.5 seconds, separating from Lamb. Wolf Champion summoned units attacks enemies within the area, prioritizing Lamb's attack target.
Wolf's basic attacks deal magic damage and scale with 25% of Kindred's bonus attack speed. Against monsters, Wolf deals 50% increased damage and his attacks slow the target by 50% for 2 seconds.
Wolf's Frenzy ends immediately if Lamb leaves the area or dies.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|25 to 45}} {{as|(+ 20% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ {{fd|1.5}}% {{as|(+ 1% per {{ai|Mark of the Kindred|Kindred|Mark}})|buzzword}} of target's '''current''' health)}}|Monster Damage|{{ap|25*1.5 to 45*1.5}} {{as|(+ {{ap|20*1.5}}% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|1.5*1.5}}% {{as|(+ {{ap|1*1.5}}% per {{ai|Mark of the Kindred|Kindred|Mark}})|buzzword}} of target's '''current''' health)}}}}
w1.notes:
* '''Wolf''' is {{tip|untargetable}} and {{tip|ghosted}} but he cannot move through terrain other than the initial dash on activation. 
* '''Wolf''' is not able to re-target {{ui|Rift Scuttler}} if he loses {{tip|sight}} of her while he's attacking it.
* ''Wolf's Frenzy'' does not end if '''Lamb''' enters {{tip|resurrection}}.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 20% bonus AD) (+ 1.5% (+ 1% per Kindred's Mark) of target's current health)
  • Monster Damage: (+ % bonus AD) (+ % (+ % per Kindred's Mark) of target's current health)

st_slices: (+ 20% bonus AD) (+ 1.5% (+ 1% per Kindred's Mark) of target's current health)
(+ % bonus AD) (+ % (+ % per Kindred's Mark) of target's current health)

e1.name: Mounting_Dread
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lamb''' fires a shot at the target enemy that {{tip|slow|slows}} them by 50% for 1 second. This attack applies a stack of ''Mounting Dread'', which refreshes on subsequent basic attacks and stacks up to 4 times.
The fourth stack will consume them all and direct '''Wolf''' to pounce on the target to deal {{as|'''additional''' physical damage}}, capped at 300 against {{tip|monster|monsters}}.

The '''additional''' damage will {{tip|critically strike}} targets below {{as|{{as|{{pp|type=critical strike chance|key=%|key1=%|15 to 15+100/2 for 11|0 to 100|formula=15% (+ 0.5% per 1% critical strike chance). ''This is capped at 100% critical strike chance.''}}|health}} of their {{sti|'''maximum''' health}}}}, increasing the {{as|'''missing''' health}} portion by {{as|{{critical damage|50|100}}|critical damage}}, and cannot {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} otherwise. The base attack part of the pounce can independently {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}}.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Lamb fires a shot at the target enemy that slows them by 50% for 1 second. This attack applies a stack of Mounting Dread, which refreshes on subsequent basic attacks and stacks up to 4 times.
The fourth stack will consume them all and direct Wolf to pounce on the target to deal additional physical damage, capped at 300 against monsters.
The additional damage will critically strike targets below 0 to 100 ‒ undefined of their maximum health, increasing the missing health portion by (+ IE 25%), and cannot critically strike otherwise. The base attack part of the pounce can independently critically strike.
leveling: {{st|Additional Physical Damage|{{ap|80 to 160}} {{as|(+ 80% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 8% {{as|(+ {{fd|0.5}}% per {{ai|Mark of the Kindred|Kindred|Mark}})|buzzword}} of target's '''missing''' health)}}|Enhanced damage below threshold|{{ap|80 to 160}} {{as|(+ 80% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{tip|critical strike|icononly = true}}{{as|(+ 12% (+{{ii|Infinity Edge|icononly = true}}{{fd|2.8}}%)|health}} {{as|(+ {{fd|0.75}}% (+{{ii|Infinity Edge|icononly = true}}{{fd|0.175}}%) per {{ai|Mark of the Kindred|Kindred|Mark}})|buzzword}} {{as|of target's '''missing''' health)}}}}
e1.cost_warn: Wiki's and Riot's mana costs do not match: Wiki's value  50 as 50 and riot's value 0,0,0,0,0 as 0

effects.str:
• Additional Physical Damage: (+ 80% bonus AD) (+ 8% (+ 0.5% per Kindred's Mark) of target's missing health)
  • Enhanced damage below threshold: (+ 80% bonus AD) critical strike(+ 12% (+Infinity Edge2.8%) (+ 0.75% (+Infinity Edge0.175%) per Kindred's Mark) of target's missing health)

st_slices: (+ 80% bonus AD) (+ 8% (+ 0.5% per Kindred's Mark) of target's missing health)
(+ 80% bonus AD) critical strike(+ 12% (+Infinity Edge2.8%) (+ 0.75% (+Infinity Edge0.175%) per Kindred's Mark) of target's missing health)

r1.name: Lamb's_Respite
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lamb''' blesses the ground under herself for 4 seconds and enters a {{rutngt|0.25}} [[Channel#Casting Times|cast time]]. '''All''' units inside the zone gain a {{tip|minimum health threshold}} of {{as|{{sti|health|10% of their '''maximum''' health}}}}, and will become {{tip|invulnerable}} for the remaining duration when they reach or are at the threshold, during which they also cannot be {{tip|heal|healed}}, but can still {{sti|health regeneration|regenerate health|link=health regeneration}}.
All targetable units within the zone are {{tip|heal|healed}} when the blessing ends.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Lamb blesses the ground under herself for 4 seconds and enters a 0.264 Channel#Casting Times. All units inside the zone gain a minimum health threshold of 10% of their maximum health, and will become invulnerable for the remaining duration when they reach or are at the threshold, during which they also cannot be healed, but can still regenerate health.
All targetable units within the zone are healed when the blessing ends.
r1.notes:
* ''Lamb's Respite'' will affect all {{tip|champions}}, {{tip|minions}}, and {{tip|monsters}}, but not {{tip|ward|wards}}, {{tip|turret|turrets}}, or [[jungle plants]].
* ''Lamb's Respite'' will affect {{tip|untargetable}} units but does not grant them the {{tip|heal}} at the end of the blessing.
** It will specifically not affect champions that are {{tip|resurrection|resurrecting}} from {{ii|Guardian Angel}}.
* {{tip|Health resource|Health costs}} will ignore ''Lamb's Respite's'' threshold.
** The cost will not be paid if the caster is below the threshold.
* ''Lamb's Respite'' has no effect on {{tip|zombie state}} or {{tip|clone}} units.
* The effects are applied before the cast time.
